string-array.name: articles
string-array.item: Tusk suggests Brexit delay of up to a year
We went troll hunting in Iceland

string-array.name: comments
string-array.item: I voted to leave! Why are politicians not fulfilling the will of the people!?
I voted to remain, but this is just ridiculous. We live in a democratic society.
Ha! Get rekt Leavers! Were never getting out and thats a good thing!

resources.string:
"About application :

"
"News24 is an application for world news ." "The app offers reading, commenting, searching, reviewing, managing articles and categories, as well as many additional functionality which are implemented in this application."
"

About us :

" "This application was made as a student project by Tim 2.1.
" "Mentor on the project Stevan Gostojić.
" "Asisten on the project Miloš Simić." "

Members of Team 2.1 on this project are : "

Isidora Aleksić, Aleksandar Lupić, Marko Zorić and Stefan Milanović.

"
